mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFVERLANRESTAG, t1.WFVERSION, t1.WFWFID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWFNAME, t1.WFWFVERSIONID, t1.WFWFVERSIONNAME FROM T_SRFWFWFVERSION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFVERLANRESTAG`, t1.`WFVERSION`, t1.`WFWFID`, t11.`WFWORKFLOWNAME` AS `WFWFNAME`, t1.`WFWFVERSIONID`, t1.`WFWFVERSIONNAME` FROM `T_WFWFVERSION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_WFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFVERLANRESTAG, t1.WFVERSION, t1.WFWFID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWFNAME, t1.WFWFVERSIONID, t1.WFWFVERSIONNAME FROM T_WFWFVERSION t1 LEFT JOIN T_WFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFVERLANRESTAG, t1.WFVERSION, t1.WFWFID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWFNAME, t1.WFWFVERSIONID, t1.WFWFVERSIONNAME FROM T_SRFWFWFVERSION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFVERLANRESTAG, t1.WFVERSION, t1.WFWFID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWFNAME, t1.WFWFVERSIONID, t1.WFWFVERSIONNAME FROM T_SRFWFWFVERSION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFVERLANRESTAG], t1.[WFVERSION], t1.[WFWFID], t11.[WFWORKFLOWNAME] AS [WFWFNAME], t1.[WFWFVERSIONID], t1.[WFWFVERSIONNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFWFVERSION] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWFID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID
